## Test Scoring Rules


```{r}
library("scoringRules")
```

Example 1
```{r}
X <- matrix(seq(1:12), nrow = 4, ncol = 3)
obs = c(0,1,2,3)
es_sample(obs, dat = X)

print(X)
print(obs)
```

```{r}
energyscore = es_sample(obs, dat = X)
variogramscore = vs_sample(obs, X, w = NULL, p = 0.5)
variogramscore
```

energy score =  `r energyscore`

variogram score = `r variogramscore`
